Package org.apache.iceberg

Interface DataTask

All Superinterfaces:
ContentScanTask<DataFile>, FileScanTask, PartitionScanTask, ScanTask, Serializable, SplittableScanTask<FileScanTask>
public interface DataTask extends FileScanTask
A task that returns data as rows instead of where to read data.
